name: Another Edge: The Last Ordeal of Sirous
name_original: Another Edge: The Last Ordeal of Sirous
description:
These are the last moments of Sirous's life. All his other crew mates are gone, and he remained here intentionally to guarantee a safe passage for them. Every second he survives and every single creature he slays are tremendously appreciated by his mates. So don't let his sacrifices to be in vain....

Controls:

Mouse Aim  -  Choose Destination
Left Click  -  Spin 'n Chop

Created By:

MahmoodJ - Design & Code
Edd3 - Music & Sounds
DaKid - Graphics
